nxt.drivers

Class MotorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • nxt.drivers.MotorController

  • public final class MotorController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to allow access to the motors controlling the robot's wheels. This class is thread-safe.
    Author:
    Andrei Purcarus

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void floatMotors() 
      static int getLeftTachoCount()
      Returns the number of degrees the left wheel has turned forward since the beginning.
      static int getRightTachoCount()
      Returns the number of degrees the right wheel has turned forward since the beginning.
      static void moveBackward(double speed)
      Moves the robot backward at the given speed in cm/s.
      static void moveForward(double speed)
      Moves the robot forward at the given speed in cm/s.
      static void turn(double angle, double speed)
      Turns the robot by the specified angle counterclockwise at the given speed in deg/s.
      static void turnOnLeftWheel(double angle, double speed)
      Turns the robot by the specified angle counterclockwise at the given speed in deg/s.
      static void turnOnRightWheel(double angle, double speed)
      Turns the robot by the specified angle counterclockwise at the given speed in deg/s.

    • Method Detail

      • moveForward

        public static final void moveForward(double speed)
        Moves the robot forward at the given speed in cm/s.

      • moveBackward

        public static final void moveBackward(double speed)
        Moves the robot backward at the given speed in cm/s.

      • turn

        public static final void turn(double angle,
                              double speed)
        Turns the robot by the specified angle counterclockwise at the given speed in deg/s.

      • floatMotors

        public static final void floatMotors()

      • turnOnLeftWheel

        public static final void turnOnLeftWheel(double angle,
                                         double speed)
        Turns the robot by the specified angle counterclockwise at the given speed in deg/s. Does this by using the left wheel as a pivot.

      • turnOnRightWheel

        public static final void turnOnRightWheel(double angle,
                                          double speed)
        Turns the robot by the specified angle counterclockwise at the given speed in deg/s. Does this by using the right wheel as a pivot.

      • getLeftTachoCount

        public static final int getLeftTachoCount()
        Returns the number of degrees the left wheel has turned forward since the beginning. Not synchronized to allow read access to the tachometers while the robot is moving.

      • getRightTachoCount

        public static final int getRightTachoCount()
        Returns the number of degrees the right wheel has turned forward since the beginning. Not synchronized to allow read access to the tachometers while the robot is moving.
